price: Kuma ka yi musu gargaɗi kan rãnar (Sã'a) makusanciya, a lõkacin da zukãta suke mãsu cika da bakin ciki, ga maƙõsansu. Bãbu wani masõyi ga azzãlumai, kuma bãbu wani mai cẽto da zã a yi wa dã'a (ga cẽtonsu).
arabic: وَأَنذِرۡهُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡأٓزِفَةِ إِذِ ٱلۡقُلُوبُ لَدَى ٱلۡحَنَاجِرِ كَٰظِمِينَۚ مَا لِلظَّٰلِمِينَ مِنۡ حَمِيمٖ وَلَا شَفِيعٖ يُطَاعُ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
